data.message: Hello I am Still having that problem with my activity log , still getting just a grey page !!!!!!!  PLEASE FIX  these problems. Thank you

replies.message: Hi Audrey. Please help our team track these issues by reporting them with these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2sOBCUO. Thanks. -William

Only you can fix that problem. It's so important to be active and having lots of activity and logging that down because like.. it's unhealthy if your not active. So having lots of activity will help you be in good shape. 😁❤️
Facebook I have been reporting the Activity Log problem since May 30Th where you told  me to go and report it . It still has never been fixed!!!

Facebook To Mark I thank you for being with me and my friends. I want to play happy and free from Facebook. But I and my friends are experiencing this problem. I want to find out who reported the spam. Can i do Thanks for the spoil
Hello I am Still having that problem with my activity log , still getting just a grey page !!!!!!!
